Wadah Pegawai KPK Tepis Tudingan Rekayasa Penyiraman Air Keras Novel Baswedan
06 Nov 2019, 19:21 by Chairul Umam



Wadah Pegawai KPK Tepis Tudingan Rekayasa Penyiraman Air Keras Novel Baswedan



Wadah Pegawai KPK Tepis Tudingan Rekayasa Penyiraman Air Keras Novel Baswedan



Wadah Pegawai KPK Tepis Tudingan Rekayasa Penyiraman Air Keras Novel Baswedan


KBRN, Jakarta : Kader Partai Demokrasi Indonesia Perjuangan (PDIP) Dewi Tanjung telah melaporkan dan membuat Berita Acara Pidana terkait penyiraman air keras yang dialami penyidik senior Komisi Pemberantasan Korupsi (KPK) Novel Baswedan ke Polda Metro Jaya.
Dewi Tanjung menuding Novel telah melakukan rekayasa dalam kasus penyiraman air keras ke matanya yang terjadi April 2017.
Menanggapi pengaduan tersebut, Ketua Wadah Pegawai kpk yudi purnomo mengungkapkan adanya Upaya-upaya untuk menyerang Novel, menurutnya tim teknis yang menangani kasus novel merupakan rekomendasi dari tim pecari fakta, yang terduri dari pakar dan ahli yang tidak mungkin jika kasus Novel adalah rekayasa.
" Namun tim teknis juga sudah turun, yang merupakan rekomendasi dari tim pencari fakta gabungan yang terdiri dari pakar juga belum tertangkap pelakunya, sehingga dari sini kita bisa lihat bahwa sama sekali tidak ada rekayasa terhadap kasus penyerangan bang novel," ungkap Yudi Purnomo di gedung KPK, Rabu (6/11/2019).
Lebih lanjut Yudi juga menjelaskan bahwa pada awal Desember di mana Presiden telah menetapkan agar pelaku penyiraman bisa dibuktikan ke publik, bahwa bukan pelaku penyiramannya saja, melainkan pelaku intelektual juga bisa tertangkap.
"Jadi kami masih menunggu tanggal Desember nanti di awal pengungkapannya, dan kami berharap pelakunya bukan hanya orang yang di lapangan yang menyiram bang Novel, tetapi pelaku-pelaku intelektualnya juga sudah tertangkap," ungkap Yudi Purnomo.
Sementara itu, Dewi Tanjung sebaai pelapor berpendapat bahwa kasus penyiraman air keras Novel Baswedan merupakan rekayasa. Menurut dia, terdapat banyak kejanggalan dalam kasus itu, seperti efek dari air keras yang hanya merusak bagian mata Novel.
Menurut dia, dampak dari air keras seharusnya juga merusak hingga bagian pipi.
Perempuan yang juga pernah menuding Politikus Partai Amanat Nasional (PAN) Amien Rais melakukan makar ITU, menilai ada kejanggalan dari video-video yang memperlihatkan kondisi Novel, termasuk salah satu video Novel dengan keadaan mata tidak rusak yang viral di sosial media.

KPK Employee Containers Accuse Allegations of Baswedan Hard Watering Engineering


KBRN, Jakarta: cadre of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle (PDIP) Dewi Tanjung has reported and made a Minutes of Criminal Acts related to the pouring of hard water experienced by senior investigators of the Corruption Eradication Commission (KPK) Novel Baswedan to the Metro Jaya Regional Police.
Dewi Tanjung accused the novel of being involved in an attempt to spray hard water into her eyes that occurred in April 2017.
Responding to the complaint, the Chair of the Employees' Office, Yudi Purnomo, revealed that there were efforts to attack the Novel, according to him, the technical team that handled the novel case was a recommendation from the fact-finding team, which was stolen from experts and experts who were not possible if the Novel case was fabricated.
"But the technical team has also come down, which is a recommendation from a joint fact-finding team consisting of experts who have not yet been caught by the culprit, so from here we can see that there is absolutely no engineering to the novel bang attack case," said Yudi Purnomo at the KPK building , Wednesday (11/06/2019).
Furthermore Yudi also explained that in early December where the President had determined that the watering perpetrators could be proven to the public, that not only the watering actors, but intellectual actors could also be caught.
"So we are still waiting for the December date at the beginning of the disclosure, and we hope that the perpetrators will not only be people in the field who have been spraying novels, but intellectual actors have also been captured," said Yudi Purnomo.
Meanwhile, Dewi Tanjung as a reporter believes that the Baswedan Novel hard watering case was fabricated. According to him, there are many irregularities in the case, such as the effect of hard water which only damages the eyes of the novel.
According to him, the impact of hard water should also damage the cheeks.
The woman who had also accused the National Mandate Party Politician (PAN) Amien Rais of treason was ITU, assessing the irregularities of videos that show the condition of the novel, including one video novel with a state of undamaged eyes that were viral on social media.
